sen.j: 裏白峠（うらじろとうげ）は滋賀県甲賀市と京都府宇治田原町の間にある峠。
sen.e: Urajiro Pass (Urajiro Toge) is a pass located between Koga City in Shiga Prefecture and Uji-Tawara-cho in Kyoto Prefecture.
Urajiro-toge Pass is a pass located between Koga City in Shiga Prefecture and Ujitawara Town in Kyoto Prefecture.
Urajiro-toge Pass is a pass located between Koga City in Shiga Prefecture and Ujitawara Town in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 国道307号の旧道であり、急勾配・ 急カーブが連続する交通の難所のため早期の改良が望まれていた。
sen.e: It is an old road of Route 307 and it required early improvement since it was a traffic choke point which had continuous steep slopes and sharp curves.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: It is an old road of Route 307 and it required early improvement since it was a traffic choke point which had continuous steep slopes and sharp curves.
It is an old road of Route 307 and it required early improvement since it was a traffic choke point which had continuous steep slopes and sharp curves.

sen.j: しかし、茶屋トンネル（L＝390m）を含む約2kmバイパス道路の開通により、交通ネック区間が解消された。
sen.e: However, the traffic bottleneck was relieved after the opening of new bypass which was approximately 2km including Chaya Tunnel (390m in length).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: However, the traffic bottleneck was relieved after the opening of new bypass which was approximately 2km including Chaya Tunnel (390m in length).
However, the traffic bottleneck was relieved after the opening of new bypass which was approximately 2km including Chaya Tunnel (390m in length).
